attributes.additional_details:
Mr Jonhson does not act in people's interest but towards his own benefit at all times.
On Thursday all 3 of the other nations called off Christmas and. The opposition also did so
The science and doctors advise in favor of changing Christmas plans du to the new covid mutation. Yet Mr Johnson acted in his own interest and went ahead to preserve popularity. He then made A U turn decision, and let the whole country down. Letting people hopes running high to see loved ones. Letting people spend their saving for the occasion
attributes.background: Make Boris Johnson step down as a prime minister. Inability to run government, assess his aptitude for the job

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign, or for votes of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Hold an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
